formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Configuration to use.

formElement.label: Output Property Sheet:
formElement.documentation: Property sheet that results will be returned into

formElement.label: Change Package ID:
formElement.documentation: Change package to migrate

formElement.label: Scheme:
formElement.documentation: Migration scheme to use

formElement.label: Quiesce:
formElement.documentation: CSD-based CICS Configurations only: specifies whether to set each resource to a (resource-type-dependent) status that allows its definition to be installed (for example, disabled, closed, or out of service), before attempting to install to it. If you do not specify this "quiesce" option, and a resource is in a status that does not allow the install action, then the install action for that resource definition will fail

formElement.label: Qualification Data:
formElement.documentation: Qualification Data is optional data passed through the Install operations qualification exit point. The needs of your organization determine whether you use an exit program and what processing it performs

formElement.label: Discard:
formElement.documentation: Whether to discard the resource definition before attempting to install it

formElement.label: Force:
formElement.documentation: Applies only to Context-based CICS configurations

formElement.label: Target Scope:
formElement.documentation: Required for Context-based CICS configurations, ommit for CDS-based CICS configurations

formElement.label: Resource Group Object Type:
formElement.documentation: Filter to select resource definitions of a particular type, excluding any other types of resource definition in the ResGroup, applies only to Context-based CICS configurations

formElement.label: CONNDEF Resource Assignment:
formElement.documentation: Applies only to Context-based CICS configurations

formElement.label: FILEDEF Related Scope:
formElement.documentation: Applies only to Context-based CICS configurations

formElement.label: FILEDEF Usage:
formElement.documentation: Applies only to Context-based CICS configurations

formElement.label: PROGDEF Related Scope:
formElement.documentation: Applies only to Context-based CICS configurations

formElement.label: PROGDEF Usage:
formElement.documentation: Applies only to Context-based CICS configurations

formElement.label: PROGDEF Mode:
formElement.documentation: Applies only to Context-based CICS configurations

formElement.label: TDQDEF Related Scope:
formElement.documentation: Applies only to Context-based CICS configurations

formElement.label: TDQDEF Usage:
formElement.documentation: Applies only to Context-based CICS configurations

formElement.label: TDQDEF Mode:
formElement.documentation: Applies only to Context-based CICS configurations

formElement.label: TRANDEF Related Scope:
formElement.documentation: Applies only to Context-based CICS configurations

formElement.label: TRANDEF Usage:
formElement.documentation: Applies only to Context-based CICS configurations

formElement.label: TRANDEF Mode:
formElement.documentation: Applies only to Context-based CICS configurations
